articles.author: Greg Beacham
articles.title: Los Angeles Angels hire former catcher Kurt Suzuki as their next manager - AP News
articles.description: The Los Angeles Angels have hired former major league catcher Kurt Suzuki as their next manager. Suzuki spent the past three seasons as a special assistant to Angels general manager Perry Minasian. Suzuki played 16 seasons in the major leagues for five teams,…
articles.content:
ANAHEIM, Calif. (AP) The Los Angeles Angels hired former major league catcher Kurt Suzuki as their next manager on Tuesday.
Suzuki has spent the past three seasons as a special assistant to Angels g… [+2425 chars]
